original_title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 4: Vegvísir
overview: Solitude does pretty crazy things to the human mind. It can bring out immense creativity and inspiration, but it can also erode at one's psyche, and cause you to sort of come apart. In this fourth episode, I talk about the isolation I experienced in the north of Iceland, and how it affected and shaped this album.
tagline: Cat"a*clasm\ n. A breaking asunder; a violent disruption.
title: The Making Of Cataclasm, Episode 4: Vegvísir
